         RELEVANT                   Scientiﬁc Advisor, IVADO Labs, Montreal, QC                                   September 2019 – present                                                                            
         INDUSTRY                      • Technical consulting for large companies regarding the deployment                                                                                                            
         EXPERIENCE                      of AI strategies for supply chain, forecasting, and operations.

                                         language processing.

                                    Scientiﬁc Advisor, Relation Therapeutics, London, UK                               March 2020 – present

                                       • Provide expert advice on graph neural network (GNN) techniques.                                                                                                              

                                    Visiting Researcher, Facebook AI Research, Montreal, QC              September 2018 – September 2019                                                                              
                                       • Developed new algorithms for graph representation learning,                                                                                                                  
                                         natural language processing, and reinforcement learning.                                                                                                                     

                                    Research Scientist, Amazon Inc., Seattle, WA                                   June 2014 – August 2014                                                                            
                                       • Worked on demand forecasting for Amazon Web Services (AWS).
